item.title: Don't Travel to Israel on a Friday
item.description: Landing during Shabbat: a story of what not to do.

item.title: Avoid Chaos on Your Next Trip: Proven Strategies for Digital Nomads
item.description: Traveling and working at the same time requires attention to details that we usually overlook. Here are the steps I follow every time I organize my trips.

item.title: AWS Lambdas and Microservices: The First Step to Scaling Your Infrastructure at Low Cost
item.description: We started working with microservices four years ago. Today, we have over 200 of them performing various critical business processes, but the path had a few bumps.

item.title: Four Years of Traveling the World: Lessons I Learned as a Digital Nomad
item.description: The life of a digital nomad is far from the idealised image of working on a paradise beach in Bali. Is not for everyone. Would you dare to try it?
